title: RE20001: Introduction To Reliability Engineering - Quick Facts
text:
RE20001
Course name | Introduction To Reliability Engineering
Offered by | Subir Chowdhury School of Quality and Reliability
Credits | 2
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | {{{semester}}}

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Basic Definitions of reliability and maintainability terms. Failure rates such as constant, increasing, and decreasing hazard rates. Reliability Block Diagram, Series, parallel, series-parallel, standby, and k-out-of- modeling. Reliability prediction and estimation, Life Testing. The concepts of availability, maintainability, safety, and probabilistic risk of engineering products. Basic concepts of software reliability
